website_summaries.verdict: The prevailing impression of the consumers confirms the quality of performance of the Adidas Ultraboost X 3D. This neutral running shoe features the Adidas’ latest technologies and materials that help enhance the speed. Despite the criticisms received from some dissatisfied users, many still recommended the shoe for the responsive cushioning and support that it provides.
pros: Many users agreed that the  Adidas Ultraboost X 3D is comfortable
Consumers loved the stylish design and fit of this shoe
This running shoe is lightweight, according to several buyers
The Adidas Ultraboost X 3D is flexible and responsive, based on some reviews
A few testers noted that the shoe is perfect for running and casual walks
Some people said that the upper hugs the foot without restricting natural foot movements
Numerous runners testified that the shoe was supportive
cons: Some purchasers mentioned that the forefoot area of this shoe is a bit narrow
A wearer noted that the shoe makes a lot of noise while running
The arch support band causes pain, said a commenter

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe. Seems to run a half size larger than most shoes. May be due to not having laces. I usually wear a 7.5 but had to return for a 7.
customer_reviews.author: steve gandy

customer_reviews.title: Podiatrist said hell no-more painful than 5’ heels!
customer_reviews.text: Wow so so cute amd SO miserable to wear due to design flaw!! My Podiatrist even examined them...the stripe wraps around mid foot and oressures the exaxt wring area causing miserably painful ache thatdows not aubside until shoe is removed. She said that is a dangerous spot for pressure, poor design! Was so sad bc So cute.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Malach

customer_reviews.title: Weird Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: For the price I would have expected the sneaker to be made a lot better. The area under the arch looks like it’s ready to come apart from the base. The only thing I like is the color. Shame on you Stella McCartney and Adidas to charge so much for this sneaker!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great for running, the band across might feel a bit too tight through
customer_reviews.text: Love the color combination and the laceless/ sock silhouette on these ultraboost. Only comment is the band that runs across could feel a bit tight.
customer_reviews.author: Leyla Erciyas

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and comfort all in one
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of these shoes. I had to order a half size down from normal to get correct fit. I own another pair of ultraboosts and had to do the same for them. If you do not like your arch to feel constricted, the Stella McCartney ultraboosts aren't for you. I don't mind this and anticipated it with the design.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: These seem to run really large
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in a size 9, that is my typical athletic shoe size but these felt like clown shoes. I love the look and overall quality, however, I returned them for their size.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: They do run about a half size too big but they are super comfortable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: GoCardinals

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very classy pair of sneakers. The red is not so bright. They are large. I normally use size 6 adidas so I returned to change for a 5.5
customer_reviews.author: miamibrasil

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: These run big so I returned them immediately. It’s been almost a month and the seller still hasn’t returned my money:/
customer_reviews.author: Tcow

customer_reviews.title: A most unattractive shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are downright ugly. The front (toe) section balloons out making a size 7 look enormous. Someone did not think through this design. I sent them back as I would never wear such a clumsy looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feet ache in these
customer_reviews.text: They kill your feet. Very tight on the arch and no support
customer_reviews.author: P.Noles

customer_reviews.title: run about 1/2 sz big. I ordered a half size smaller than I normally do for my  se pair and
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love everything about them! Comfort, style, and fit all wrapped up in one.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Alfaro

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Fit
customer_reviews.text: I never order shoes or sneakers online, I need to always try them on to see how they fit before making a purchase. These fit amazingly well they are so light, soft and comfortable. It feels like you are wearing socks and walking on clouds! Definitely want these in every color!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Sierra

customer_reviews.title: No false advertising...received exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Loved that my order was excellent with fit, promptness, and expected fashion style. Doing my walk/run tomorrow with them! Loved how they were wrapped up with your cool ShopBop red inside the box. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Malena

customer_reviews.title: Super adorable pair of tennis shoes that I just couldn’t live without!
customer_reviews.text: I saw these shoes sum time ago and wanted them however could find my size. I was super happy to see them here on Amazon! And I got them in two days!!
customer_reviews.author: Space Captains

customer_reviews.title: Not much support
customer_reviews.text: These shoes don’t have much support to them so it feels like you are standing just in the soles of the shoe. Not what I expected from a $150 pair of sneakers...
customer_reviews.author: Yvette and Maja

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have high arch foot and It's a perfect model for me. It's beautiful and comfortable at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Rotem

customer_reviews.title: Super good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great product, box was a bit damaged but great other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have slender feet so the band isn’t tight at all. These shoes are like walking on heaven. I’m graduating nursing school so these will be perfect to work in!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and supportive shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes feel just like slippers!! The sole honestly makes you feel like you're walking on a cushion. The strap is very snug around the top/arch of your foot, so just be aware of that. Looking to buy one more pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L Hines

customer_reviews.title: TRUE SO SIZE? Yes
customer_reviews.text: WOULD YOU RECOMEND THIS SHOE FOR SOMEONE WITH FALT FEET? YES
customer_reviews.author: maria

product_meta.title: adidas by Stella McCartney Women's Ultraboost X 3D Sneakers
product_meta.description:
* Time to enter beast mode wearing the adidas® by Stella McCartney™ Ultraboost X 3.D sneaker. 
 * Knitted fabric and synthetic upper. 
 * Dual supportive elastic bands across the vamp.
 * Round toe silhouette. 
 * Pull-tab at the heel.
 * Fabric lining and footbed.
 * This product contains Parley Ocean Plastic™ which is made from recycled waste, intercepted from beaches and coastal communities before it reaches the ocean. 
 * Features responsive Boost technology for added cushion and energy. 
 * Rubber outsole. 
 * Imported. 
 * Measurements: *  Weight: 8 oz
   
   
 * Product measurements were taken using size 7.5, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
 * Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Pull-tab at the heel. Fabric lining and footbed. This product contains Parley Ocean Plastic™ which is made from recycled waste, intercepted from beaches and coastal communities before it reaches the ocean. Features responsive Boost technology for added cushion and energy. Rubber outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 8 oz Product measurements were taken using size 7.5, width M.
